document.full_text: a pakistani navy commando was the first to detect taliban militants attacking a naval aviation base in the city of karachi on sunday night. he was dead within seconds.
document.title: how did six taliban hold off 100 security forces for 16 hours?
lines_and_colors: a pakistani navy commando was the first to detect taliban militants attacking a naval aviation base in the city of karachi on sunday night. he was dead within seconds.
